strapiPost.title: Shop 100+ Local Vendors During the Black Owned NWA Business Expo
strapiPost.content:
Celebrate National Black Business Month at the Black Owned NWA Business Expo at the Fayetteville Town Center & Fayetteville Town Square this Saturday, Aug 26, from 5-9p.

Build Community: The Expo provides a physical and digital platform for Black businesses, events, and resources with the goal of helping members of the Black Community thrive in Northwest Arkansas.

Shop Local: Explore over 100 vendors from the region, featuring items ranging from vintage clothing and candles to baked goods, hot tea, and samosas. The event is free and open to the public.

Reserve your free tickets to the Black Owned NWA Business Expo HERE.
